title.narrative: Programme Funded Climate and Environment Advisor

description.narrative: This activity (Programme Funded Climate and Environment Advisor) is a component of Transboundary Water Management in Southern Africa reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £707,315. This component benefits South of Sahara, regional, and works in the following sector(s): Water sector policy and administrative management, River basins development, Environmental policy and administrative management. The start date is 20-03-2017 and the end date is 31-03-2022.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

sector.narrative: Water sector policy and administrative management
